page.title: 05CHILDREN'S GAMES-2
page.content: { Jump the Rope The children stand in a circle around the swinger who holds a rope. The swinger swings the rope around at ground level while the others have to jump over the rope. If the rope hits someones legs they become the new swinger. { Hand clapping Find a partner and face each other. Clap your own hands together, then clap your partners. Clap together again then clap opposite hands. The first one to go wrong is the loser. { Star wars We put the bought figures in the right spaceships. Then we have battles with the figures and spaceships. We put string from the door handle to the bed and window then hang the figures from the string and have battles there.
